skillTree.name: Elven Steed
skillTree.description: The bond between rider and steed goes beyond friendship or family; they act as one.

skillTree.name: Great Stag
skillTree.description: With its magnificent frame and the great plumes of steam of its snorting breath, the Great Stag instils unflinching valour into those who ride it.

skillTree.name: Great Eagle
skillTree.description: Fly on your wings, like an eagle. Touch the sun. Track the foe, ambush, and defeat.

skillTree.name: Marked by Kurnous
skillTree.description: The God of the Hunt freely gifts his deific zeal for war to all nobles deemed worthy of their responsibilities to Athel Loren.

skillTree.name: Kinband Captain
skillTree.description: Longbow kinbands are regimented and resourceful when defending their forest homes, advancing and retreating like leaves in a storm.

skillTree.name: Ward of Loec
skillTree.description: The Trickster God knows all manner of ploys and ruses that can be used to counter missile attacks.

skillTree.name: Ward of Hoeth
skillTree.description: Knowledge can be used as a shield against magical attack.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ€¦

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Arrow of Kurnous
skillTree.description: When the arrow flies farther, it may kill sooner, which is vital in the Hunt.

skillTree.name: Fleetfinger
skillTree.description: Nook and fire. Nook again, and fire. Nook a third time, and fire. All in a heartbeat.

skillTree.name: Piercing Shots
skillTree.description: The forest teaches a warrior not only when to fire but where, which makes a bigger difference.

skillTree.name: Bottomless Quiver
skillTree.description: Always willing to fight on, a widened quiver allows arrows to rain, almost without end.

skillTree.name: Expeditious Endeavour
skillTree.description: What the enemy cannot see, it cannot hit. What the enemy cannot see, it cannot survive.

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Endurance of the Oak
skillTree.description: Taking their cue from the forest itself, the Lord endures and overcomes all.

skillTree.name: Impenetrable Bark
skillTree.description: Using the forest itself as a shield, this Lord is protected by their devotion to Athel Loren.

skillTree.name: Tempered Rigour
skillTree.description: When to strike, when to block, when to dodge. These are all skills the warriors of Athel Loren must perfect.

skillTree.name: Violent Delights
skillTree.description: There is no greater thrill than to be in the midst of battle, slaughtering in the forest's name.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

skillTree.name: Born to Ride
skillTree.description: Perfectly at home in the saddle, this warrior can ride at full-pelt through terrain others would struggle with on foot.

effects.description: Attribute: Strider when mounted on an Elven Steed or Great Stag

skillTree.name: Death from Above
skillTree.description: Following the example of the Doomstar, this warrior specializes in devastating, demoralizing strikes from the sky.

effects.description: Attribute: Causes Terror when mounted on a Great Eagle
Attribute: Causes Fear for Hawk Rider units

skillTree.name: Touched by Loec
skillTree.description: A member of the Wardancer kindred, this warrior fights to Loec's silent song.

effects.description: Ability: The Shadows Coil (when not using a mount)
Attribute: Stalk (when not using a mount)
Attribute: Vanguard Deployment for Wardancer and Bladesinger units

skillTree.name: Wildwood Veteran
skillTree.description: This warrior has patrolled the borders of the Wildwood, facing down horrors unknowable and standing unfazed.

effects.description: Attribute: Vanguard Deployment for Wildwood Ranger units

skillTree.name: Dance of Loec
skillTree.description: This ritualistic war dance requires neither rhythm nor order, enabling evasion of the enemyâ€™s clumsy attacks, and lethal counterattacks.

skillTree.name: Possessed by the Trickster God
skillTree.description: Once consumed by Loecâ€™s aspect, one can instinctively evade attack through trickery, mimicking his deception of the Dark Gods.

effects.description: Passive ability: "Possessed by the Trickster God"

skillTree.name: {{tr:agent_action_name_increase_mobility}}
skillTree.description: Whether it be training harder, travelling lighter, eating less or sleeping better, there's always a way to draw more from the day.

effects.description: Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 5%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 10%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.name: {{tr:agent_action_name_boost_income}}
skillTree.description: Such magic-users may be wise and able to offer sage advice, especially if they have scried the region.

effects.description: Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 2%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 4%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 6%

skillTree.name: {{tr:agent_action_name_damage_building}}
skillTree.description: It is not just the forces of Chaos that can despoil, break and ruin.

effects.description: Damage Building action: Additional 5% damage caused
Damage Building action: Additional 15% damage caused
Damage Building action: Additional 30% damage caused

skillTree.name: {{tr:agent_action_name_wound}}
skillTree.description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.name: {{tr:agent_action_name_assault_unit}}
skillTree.description: "I'm no pupil, but an adept! A hex on them, may their souls shrivel from their bones!"

effects.description: Assault Unit action: Additional 5% damage caused
Assault Unit action: Additional 15% damage caused
Assault Unit action: Additional 30% damage caused

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

skillTree.name: Ariel's Chosen
skillTree.description: Those whom the Mage Queen has favoured fight as if powered by her hand.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve change: +10% when increasing

skillTree.name: Talon of Kurnous
skillTree.description: The first arrow of battle must fly truest.

skillTree.name: Fleet-Footed
skillTree.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fightâ€¦ or when trying to get away afterwards!

skillTree.name: Cunning
skillTree.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

skillTree.name: Determined
skillTree.description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

skillTree.name: Confident
skillTree.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

skillTree.name: Disciplined
skillTree.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

skillTree.name: Perceptive
skillTree.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

skillTree.name: Aggressive
skillTree.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

skillTree.name: Tough
skillTree.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

skillTree.name: Strong
skillTree.description: Well built, robust. Powerful.

skillTree.name: Weapon Master
skillTree.description: If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.

skillTree.name: Strategist
skillTree.description: This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

skillTree.name: Tactician
skillTree.description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.
